testimonials.text: Richard Machado is a walking genius.

That Richard Machado must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of Web Development School and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
